thread.title: After Taimur Ali Khan and Misha Kapoor, this video of Tusshar Kapoor’s baby Laksshya is going viral
thread.title_full: After Taimur Ali Khan and Misha Kapoor, this video of Tusshar Kapoor’s baby Laksshya is going viral

author: Snehal Rajani
title: After Taimur Ali Khan and Misha Kapoor, this video of Tusshar Kapoor’s baby Laksshya is going viral
text:
Nargis Fakhri, Esha Gupta, Vaani Kapoor at store launch of designer fashion house AZA - View Pics! 
I think this year officially belongs to the babies of B- town. First Kareena Kapoor Khan’s baby boy Taimur, then Shahid Kapoor’s little munchkin Misha and now it’s Tusshar Kapoor’s son Laksshya who is ruling our hearts. The actor shared a super cute video of his son attempting his first turn. The video shows how Laksshya takes the first turn on his bed and like a dotting father, Tusshar who cannot contain his excitement, cheers “w ” . Watch the video for yourself.. (ALSO READ: Tusshar Kapoor gives a funny twist to his son Laksshya’s onesie ) A post shared by Tusshar (@tusshark89)  01pm PST 
Awww.. Isn’t this pure joy? 
Unlike a couple of other celebrity parents who have initially shied away from showing their baby to the world, Tusshar has always been very open to the idea of the same. He fathered a baby boy through surrogacy using IVF last year and when the news broke out, it came to everyone as a pleasant surprise. The first pictures of his son were all over the internet. Remember those pics in which he was seen carrying Laksshya on his shoulder in the balcony of his house? The announcement of the news was not an easy task for him as his family was not too keen on letting the world know about IVF. “Initially my parents were a little bit apprehensive whether I should announce the child to be one born through IVF and surrogacy or not. Because they were like ‘You don’t know how it is going to be taken in India, why even announce it, why don’t you just tell friends, then the friends will tell more friends…,” Tusshar told reporters at an event about IVF technology. “I am happy that I have taken the right decision. Our family is complete now, we are five now, grandparents, me, my sister and little Laksshya,” Tusshar had said while addressing the media at his residence earlier. Being a single parent is a tough and very challenging role but I am sure Tusshar is doing his job pretty well.. (ALSO READ: Tusshar Kapoor’s picture with son Laksshya is simply adorable ) 
So tell us BollywoodLifers, what’s your take on this adorable video of Tusshar’s baby’s first roll? Drop your views in the comment section below. Published: February 19, 2017 6:23 pm | Updated: February 19, 2017 6:27 pm Topics:
